mapper.update: update ujcms_short_message set type_ = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, receiver_ = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_ = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_date_ = #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attempts_ = #{attempts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip_ = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usage_ = #{usage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, status_ = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_short_message (id_, type_, receiver_, code_, send_date_, attempts_, ip_, usage_, status_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attempts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.type_, t.receiver_, t.code_, t.send_date_, t.attempts_, t.ip_, t.usage_, t.status_
